basics.name: Vishnu Vardhan Revalapalli
basics.label: Technical Lead
basics.summary: Passionate software developer with around 8 years of experience driving quality and consistency throughout all phases of software development projects. A partner who leads collaborative efforts with analysts, QA and support engineers throughout a product lifecycle to produce high-quality, user-friendly, scalable and bug-free software. I credit my success to the fundamental belief that business needs must be fully understood and remain paramount throughout a project. Compounded by my core belief in Agile methodologies and extensive experience using a broad range of technologies, I’m able to document the most efficient architecture for a true end-to-end solution. Results remain unparalleled.

work.summary: HCL Technologies is a next-generation global technology company that helps enterprises reimagine their businesses for the digital age. Through its worldwide network of R&D facilities and co-innovation labs, global delivery capabilities, and over 150,000+ ‘Ideapreneurs’ across 49 countries, HCL delivers holistic services across industry verticals to leading enterprises, including 250 of the Fortune 500 and 650 of the Global 2000.
highlights: ### INGKA Group / IKEA IT AB
As part of my journey in HCL, I am working for INGKA group which brought the IKEA Brand to 30 countries and millions of homes.
Working in an enterprise environment with microservices, event-driven systems, data integration pipelines between systems and applications, monitoring the data integrations and tracing the events

Design, development, implementation and maintenance of high throughput, high volume, resilient data integration pipelines, and components between Kafka (Connect Connect), GCP, Oracle, Event Mesh (Solace), and API applications.
Development and maintenance of highly scalable, resource-efficient, flexible, resilient, fault-tolerant Kafka plugins - Connectors, Single Message Transforms and Kafka Streams applications.
Developed micro-services in SpringBoot, Flask frameworks using Java, Kotlin and Python.
Implemented Kafka mirror makers between different Kafka clusters across different data-centers.
Automation of frequent operational activities using Ansible.
Developed Jenkins CICD scripts to automate build and deployment jobs uisng Bash scripting and Groovy.

TECH: Java, Kotlin, Spring, Springboot, Strimzi Kafka, Strimzi Bridge, Kafka, Kafka Connect, Kafka Transforms, Kafka SMT, Kafka Connector, Kafka Converters, Schema Registry, AVRO, JSON, XML, Openshift, Kubernetes, Helm, Docker, Ansible, GCP, Google Cloud Pub-Sub, Cloud Run, GKE, Solace, Event Mesh, Oracle, PostgreSQL, Jenkins, Prometheus, Grafana, Splunk, Solace.

work.summary: Work full time as senior software engineer.

Designed and implemented Java-based-applications and defined the objectives & functionality based on requirement.

Outlined documents & performed program coding & testing in complince with the approved life cycle methodoligies.

Fixed & troubleshoot Java code issues and technical issues for developers during project life cycle

TECH: Material Design, Angular 8, HTML5, CSS, Type Script, Java8, Spring-Boot, Spring Framework, Rest-Service, Microservices, MySQL, Oracle, SVN, GitLab, Maven, JUnit, Jenkins, Visual Studio Code, Intellij.
